attributes.description: Introducing the new GWM Steed 5 Single Cab Facelift. With hard work in mind, we’ve created the ultimate workhorse. The Facelift Single Cab (MPi) Workhorse is powered by GWM’s proven 2.2-Litre petrol engine that develops 74 kW and 180 Nm of Torque. This engine is paired with a five-speed manual transmission and a combined-cycle fuel consumption figure of 9.9 L/ 100 kms. Features include immobiliser, fog Lamps, air-conditioning, radio+USB, power steering and remote central door lock. The vehicle comes with a 3Year/100 000 km manufacturers warranty and a roadside assistance for 2 Years.
attributes.title: 2021 GWM Steed 5 2.2 MPi Workhorse Single-Cab
